author: bridge-bot
content:
<tomlehman> Hi! I’m working on Unstoppable Rollups under an EF grant and our first Community Call unfortunately conflicted with Rollcall!

I would love the opportunity to give my presentation to the Rollcallers who missed it. The topic is “The Religion of Stage 2”—an argument that the viewpoint that Stage 2 rollups meaningfully secure user assets cannot be rationally defended.

Here is the video but I’d love to do something live to enable Q&A and debate! Thanks!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-DdFrUo1T5A
